epd_metadata.address: Level 40, Northpoint Tower, 100 Miller St, North Sydney NSW 2060, Australia
epd_metadata.product_group_classification: UN CPC 375 (Articles of concrete, cement and plaster)

product_description.packaging: Delivered in bulk with no packaging
product_description.hazardous_substances: None listed in Candidate List of Substances of Very High Concern exceeding 0.1% by weight
product_description.classification: Non-Dangerous Goods according to the Australian Code for the Transport of Dangerous Goods by Road and Rail

lca_information.scope: Cradle to gate (modules A1-A3) with options modules A4-A5, modules C1-C4 and module D
lca_information.reference_service_life: Not specified (scope is cradle to delivery)

allocation.method: Physical allocation based on weight or m続 of concrete; economic allocation used when physical allocation not possible

excluded: Environmental impact from infrastructure, construction, production equipment, and tools not directly consumed
Personnel-related impacts such as transportation to/from work
cut_off_criteria.included: All materials required for manufacturing delivered without packaging except packaging of materials

data_quality.temporal_representativeness: Data updated within 10 years as required
data_quality.background_data_sources: Assessed as good or very good

system_boundaries.upstream_processes: Module A1 - raw material extraction, transport, manufacturing, and electricity generation
system_boundaries.core_processes: Modules A2 and A3 - transport to core processes, manufacturing (excluding mixing), waste and wastewater treatment
system_boundaries.downstream_processes: Modules A4 to D - distribution, installation, construction waste, deconstruction, transport and treatment of waste, recycling benefits

primary: Abiotic depletion potential (elements and fossil fuels)
Resource use (renewable and non-renewable primary energy, secondary materials and fuels)

installation.notes: Installation inputs account for pouring and manual finishing; no pre-installation activities included

benefits_and_loads_beyond_system_boundar.recycled_aggregate_use: Recycled aggregate replaces virgin coarse aggregate depending on product performance requirements

carbon_emission_context.carbonation_note: CO2 absorption by concrete over lifetime (carbonation) not included in EPD results; recommended to consider in whole-of-life studies

allocation_method.fly_ash: Treated as waste material, only transport impacts included
allocation_method.ground_granulated_blast_furnace_slag: Economic allocation due to significant economic value
allocation_method.silica_fume: Treated as waste material, only transport impacts included

recycled_materials_handling.background_data_allocation: AusLCI LCA database allocation approach adopted for secondary data and processes

additional_info.product_group_classification: UN CPC 375 (Articles of concrete, cement and plaster)
additional_info.epd_process_certification: Achieved in 2021, first in concrete industry in Australia
additional_info.lca_modeling_notes: Foreground data modeled with product specific EPDs and databases; some impact categories calculated manually
references: Department of Climate Change, Energy, the Environment and Water (2023)
disclaimers: Results are relative statements and do not indicate endpoints, thresholds, safety margins or risks
Some impact categories have high uncertainties or limited experience
Ionising radiation indicator excludes nuclear accidents, occupational exposure, and radioactive waste disposal effects
